Key Match Events: In their last match, Pakistan defeated South Africa by 33 runs where Shadab Khan scored 52 runs in 22 balls, while Iftikhar Ahmed also scored 51 runs.
Mohammad Haris scored 28 runs in 11 balls.
Shaheen Afridi took 3 wickets for 14 runs in 3 overs against South Africa.
Shadab Khan has taken 8 wickets for Pakistan in the T20 World Cup 2022.
Mohammad Wasim has taken 7 wickets in 3 matches.
Litton Das scored 60 runs in 27 balls against India.
Nurul Hasan scored 25 runs in 14 balls against India.
Taskin Ahmed has taken 8 wickets in 4 matches at an economy of 7.
Hasan Mahmood has taken six wickets.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan will square off against Bangladesh in the 41st match of the T20 World Cup 2022 on Sunday, November 06 at Adelaide Oval.
Pakistan's batting is a matter of concern, especially for Mohammad Rizwan and Babar Azam.
Haris Rauf has been expensive, conceding 44 runs at an economy of 14.67 in the previous match.
Bangladesh is in the fourth position in Group B with 4 points.
Bangladesh's bowlers have performed better than their batsmen in the T20 World Cup 2022.
Both teams are likely to go with the same combination of players.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan vs Bangladesh match will be broadcasted on the Star Sports network on TV, and Hotstar for Indian viewers.
Pakistan has won 15 out of 17 matches against Bangladesh in their head-to-head record.
